name: Wave
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Try our skill to enable the full functionality of the Wave platform!

With the Wave skill, you can manage low supply notifications, access smart reorder settings and request information about your device. Supported devices include the Atlas Wave device. You can also enable the Alexa skill by following the instructions in the Wave app.

If you have more questions search jabilwave.zendesk.com for our articles to troubleshoot if you need any assistance with the skill or its features!
